oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Joseph Eaton Rushing tintype
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tintype of Joseph Eaton Rushing. The tintype is in its original case. Rushing wears a uniform jacket with brass buttons and a kepi. The image is deteriorated and marked with dark spottings. On reverse, an inscription reads, "Joe Rushing, ever will you be remembered by your true friends - my sweetheart 1864."
